name: Whirlpool
description: Whirlpool is about Roy, who finds himself suspiciously uncertain about a lot of things, including who he really is. And his adventure of finding out more about himself.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
